meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were pinker than the ones in the vase.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was pinker than the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The pinker cupcakes were devoured first at the party.
meanings.sent4: The sky turned pinker as the sun set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The pinker paint brightened up the room instantly.

meanings.sent1: This rose is pinker than that one.
